pages.text: $(l)Heimdall’s Gauntlet$() is the wellspring of his formidable power, bestowing upon this Aesir god the gift of short-term clairvoyance. With this artifact, Heimdall can deftly evade and, if he so desires, counter any attack with unparalleled precision. $(br2)The origins of this gauntlet are shrouded in mystery, but it is known that the dwarves, through their unmatched craftsmanship and the use of $(l:resources/svartalfheim_steel)Svartalfheim Steel$(), have made this relic accessible to mere mortals. $(br2)$(l)Abilities$():$(li)$(l)Bifrost Protection:$() Upon activation, the gauntlet grants 15 seconds of Bifrost Protection and Speed effects, rendering the wearer virtually invulnerable. After use, the Gauntlet is placed on a one-minute cooldown.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This legendary relic can only be obtained through trade with the masterful Huldra brothers, $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Brok and Sindri$().
